text:
This avoids making lots of slices, adding them, multiplying by `I`:
```julia> calc_2(Theta) = @tullio g[i,j] := -0.25*(Theta[k,i] - Theta[k,j])^2 |> exp
calc_2 (generic function with 1 method)

julia> @btime calc_T($Theta)
  10.416 μs (409 allocations: 45.32 KiB)

julia> @btime calc_2($Theta)
  571.262 ns (1 allocation: 896 bytes)```
